movies.plot: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.
movies.title: Batman Begins
Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
movies.plot: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.
movies.summary_short: The film, pitting Ben Affleck against Henry Cavill, largely serves as an extended trailer for a slate of coming DC Comics movies like â€œWonder Woman.

movies.title: Batman Returns
movies.plot: Batman returns to the big screen when a deformed man calling himself the Penguin wreaks havoc across Gotham with the help of a cruel businessman.
movies.summary_short: Penguin and Catwoman show up for the sequel. Sleeker, brighter eyeful, but with weak, drawn-out finale.
